block.p: Erika Sharon Meisel, the daughter of Gloria Bader Meisel and Dr. Barry A. Meisel of Armonk, N.Y., was married last evening to Dr. Robert Alan Schwartz, a son of Dr. Arnold Schwartz of Stamford, Conn., and the late Myna Schwartz. Rabbi Chaim Stern officiated at the Renaissance Westchester Hotel in White Plains.

Mrs. Schwartz, 25, was until last week the performing arts director of the Beaver Country Day School in Newton, Mass. She graduated from the University of Vermont and received a master's degree in educational theater from New York University. Her father is a partner in Westchester Gynecologists and Obstetricians in White Plains. Her mother is an associate professor of library science and a librarian at Westchester Community College in Valhalla, N.Y.

Erika Sharon Meisel, the daughter of Gloria Bader Meisel and Dr. Barry A. Meisel of Armonk, N.Y., was married last evening to Dr. Robert Alan Schwartz, a son of Dr. Arnold Schwartz of Stamford, Conn., and the late Myna Schwartz. Rabbi Chaim Stern officiated at the Renaissance Westchester Hotel in White Plains.

Mrs. Schwartz, 25, was until last week the performing arts director of the Beaver Country Day School in Newton, Mass. She graduated from the University of Vermont and received a master's degree in educational theater from New York University. Her father is a partner in Westchester Gynecologists and Obstetricians in White Plains. Her mother is an associate professor of library science and a librarian at Westchester Community College in Valhalla, N.Y.

Mr. Schwartz, 28, is a resident in pathology at Beth Israel Deaconess Hospital in Boston. He graduated from Cornell and received an M.D. from the University of Connecticut. His father is a radiologist at Stamford Hospital and a former president of its medical staff.
